text: dangnan rea di txb rab kar rxngreiyn kæ khea læa rea di prathan butr kæ khea khux yahˌ ya læa rea di prabprung kækhi phriya khxng khea hı pen pkti kæ khea thæcring phwk khea khængkhan kan nı kar thakhwam di læa phwk khea wingwxn rea dwy khwam hwang nı kar lngthosʹ khxng rea læa phwk khea pen phu thxmtaw kerng klaw tx rea
